tool_description:
Cheap, personal documents numbers validation. 
Service supports ID cards, passports, NIP and PESEL numbers.
name: Polish Personal Identification Numbers
title: Polish Personal Identification Numbers

api_list.name: /id/check
api_list.description: Checking and returning informations about given ID card number.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: ID card number (including serial number). * REQUIRED *

api_list.name: /passport/check
api_list.description: Checking and returning informations about given passport number.

api_list.name: /pesel/multicheck
api_list.description: Checking and returning informations about each of given PESEL number.

api_list.name: /id/multicheck
api_list.description: Checking and returning informations about each of given ID card number.

required_parameters.name: numbers
required_parameters.description: Coma separated, ID cards numbers (including serial numbers). * REQUIRED *

api_list.name: /pesel/check
api_list.description: Checking and returning informations about given PESEL number.

api_list.name: /nip/multicheck
api_list.description: Checking and returning informations about each of given NIP number.

api_list.name: /passport/multicheck
api_list.description: Checking and returning informations about each of given passport number.

required_parameters.name: numbers
required_parameters.description: Coma separated, passport documents numbers. * REQUIRED *

api_list.name: /nip/check
api_list.description: Checking and returning informations about given NIP number.
